basics.description:
**Important:** _This Azure Sentinel Solution is currently in public preview. This feature is provided without a service level agreement, and it's not recommended for production workloads. Certain features might not be supported or might have constrained capabilities. For more information, see [Supplemental Terms of Use for Microsoft Azure Previews](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/)._

**Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._



Azure Sentinel Solutions provide a consolidated way to acquire Azure Sentinel content like data connectors, workbooks, analytics, and automations in your workspace with a single deployment step.

**Playbooks:** 13

[Learn more about Azure Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

metadata.hidden: Hiding location, we get it from the log analytics workspace

basics.name: getLAWorkspace
basics.toolTip: This filters by workspaces that exist in the Resource Group selected

basics.name: workspace
basics.label: Workspace
basics.toolTip: This dropdown will list only workspace that exists in the Resource Group selected

options.text: This solution installs playbook resources.  A security playbook is a collection of procedures that can be run from Azure Sentinel in response to an alert. A security playbook can help automate and orchestrate your response, and can be run manually or set to run automatically when specific alerts are triggered. Security playbooks in Azure Sentinel are based on Azure Logic Apps, which means that you get all the power, customizability, and built-in templates of Logic Apps. Each playbook is created for the specific subscription you choose, but when you look at the Playbooks page, you will see all the playbooks across any selected subscriptions.

This playbook uses the HYAS Insight connector to automatically enrich incidents generated by Sentinel with current WHOIS information. You need a valid subscription in order to use the connector and playbook. Learn more about the integration via the https://docs.microsoft.com/connectors/hyasinsight/ or visit https://www.hyas.com/contact to request a trial key.

elements.name: playbook1-PlaybookName
elements.label: Playbook Name
elements.toolTip: Resource name for the logic app playbook.  No spaces are allowed

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a playbook resource name

elements.label: HYAS Username
elements.toolTip: Username to connect to HYAS API

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a playbook username
